Pre-Game Insights: The New Orleans Pelicans start the season at home against the Chicago Bulls.
The Pelicans finished 49-33 overall with a 21-19 record at home during the 2023-24 season.
The Bulls went 39-43 overall, 22-29 in Eastern Conference action and 19-22 on the road last season.
The Pelicans gave up 110.7 points per game while committing 18.4 fouls last season.
The Bulls averaged 112.3 points per game last season, 48.4 in the paint, 17.2 off of turnovers and 12.5 on fast breaks.
BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE: Pelicans -7.5; over/under is 224.5.
Others: Pelicans injury update: Trey Murphy III is out with a hamstring injury.
Bulls injury update: Julian Phillips is day to day with a rib injury.
